seo.title: Warehousing - FLS
seo.metaDesc: FLS Warehousing brings supply chains to the next level by co-designing, investing in, and building customised space solutions.
seo.opengraphDescription: FLS Warehousing brings supply chains to the next level by co-designing, investing in, and building customised space solutions.

capabilities.directorContent: "WE MAKE SPACES FOR YOUR BUSINESS TO GROW."
capabilities.directorFooter: FRANCESCO JOSÈ RIVI, GLOBAL HEAD OF WAREHOUSING
capabilities.textTitle: We envision spaces that bring supply chains to the next level.
capabilities.textContent:
We challenge industry standards by co-designing, investing in, and building customised space solutions that make our clients’ supply chain operations more competitive in the long term. As such, we can operate warehouses at the customer's manufacturing plant or at offsite hubs.

We serve the following industries:
•	Food and feed grade warehouses
•	General cargo warehouses services offering services for the commodity market such as steel and non-ferrous, cotton, coffee, oversized cargo, etc.
•	Automotive warehouses for parts and finished units, integrated in the assembly plant's supply chain and distribution.
•	Chemical warehouses handling liquids and solids, dangerous and non-dangerous goods.
•	FMCG and white goods warehouses.

Our IT systems allow real time visibility and traceability.

toggleList.content:
• Practical warehouse design from an operator perspective
  • Layout consultation from a logistics flow point of view
  • Customisation to meet optimal customer operational requirements

• Project and construction management and supervision
  • Seamless integration and a flexible attitude
  • Often more economical than EPC

We offer contract logistics solutions to operate your dedicated and customised warehouse.

Our solutions are seamlessly integrated with our transport, freight forwarding and trading activities. While a dedicated FLS account manager can assist you with your entire supply chain.

Customers can use FLS to operate the logistics facility or lease the customised facility on a long-term basis and operate it independently. We offer solutions for the automotive, FMCG, food/feed and chemical industries in this way.

Our state-of-the-art, multi-customer warehousing solutions are offered at variable cost and are fully certified to ISO standards. They are located on the Eastern Seaboard and in Bangkok.

  • 11,000 sqm of covered warehouse space in immediate proximity of Maptaphut and Ban Kai industrial estate
  • DIW approved Dangerous Chemicals storage facility
  • Foam sprinklers
  • Chemical retention basins
  • Explosion proof electrical system
  • Mechanical ventilation
  • Certified Emergency Response Team (CERT)
  • ISO 45001, ISO 14001, ISO 9001 and GMP certified
  • 24/7 security guards onsite, alarms system and CCTV systems
  • Repackaging and processing of hazardous and non-hazardous chemicals
  • Value added services: blending, heating, drumming, sieving of powders, pellets and liquids
  • Hazardous chemicals transportation services: port haulage, domestic deliveries and milk runs and cross-border
  • Customs clearance, international freight forwarding services

FLS SUPPLY CHAIN CENTER (RAYONG) CO., LTD.
Address: 40/1 Soi Rong Mo, Huai Pong – Nong Bon Rd., Huai Pong, Mueang Rayong District, Rayong 21150, Thailand.
Contact:
FRANCESCO JOSÈ RIVI
GLOBAL HEAD OF OCEAN PRODUCTS
(+66) 3849 4144
